heading: HR01878
0: RESOLUTION CALLING FOR THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO STUDY THE POSSIBILITY THAT A FIFTY THOUSAND (50,000) HECTARE PROPERTY LOCATED AT GEN. NAKAR, QUEZON BE DECLARED AS ALIENABLE AND DISPOSABLE LAND AS A FIRST STEP TOWARDS ITS DEVELOPMENT AS NEW POLITICAL CAPITAL OF THE PHILIPPINES
status: Pending with the Committee on NATURAL RESOURCES since 2018-05-23
